text.div:
Babesiosis (Tests for Babesia species Nucleic Acid)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    21089-8 Babesia microti DNA [Presence] in Blood by NAA with probe detection
    22853-6 Babesia caballi rRNA [Presence] in Blood by Probe
    22856-9 Babesia sp rRNA [Presence] in Tissue by Probe
    22857-7 Babesia sp DNA [Presence] in Tissue by NAA with probe detection
    42641-1 Babesia sp DNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    47396-7 Babesia microti DNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    67867-2 Babesia sp identified in Unspecified specimen
    88233-2 Babesia sp DNA [Presence] in Blood by NAA with probe detection
    88450-2 Babesia divergens+MO-1 strain 18S rRNA gene [Presence] in Blood by NAA with non-probe detection
    88451-0 Babesia duncani 18S rRNA gene [Presence] in Blood by NAA with non-probe detection
    88452-8 Babesia microti 18S rRNA gene [Presence] in Blood by NAA with non-probe detection
    89342-0 Babesia sp 18S rRNA [Presence] in Blood by NAA with probe detection
